results.name: The Chicago-land Entrepreneurs, Futures and Bitcoin Traders

results.description:
https://youtu.be/VSQ3LlrKBSs

The focus of Women Entrepreneurs is to build a community of opportunities for women entrepreneurs, that are taught by leaders who've already become successful Angel Investors, VC's, Speakers, Coaches, Trainers, and Service professionals.  The community is dedicated to building relationships that focus on training, connections, collaboration, celebration, support and business growth.

If you are an individual that is open and willing to share your wisdom to empower, educate and mentor others, you are welcome to this group.

We have members looking to connect with business partners; members simply seeking inspiration and advice from mentors; members seeking feedback peer-to-peer. Whether you are a student, investor, potential client, employee or employer, there is something for all business minded individuals to share and/or contribute.

Let's meet with others in the Bay Area who want to develop their business, be financially independent, aim to be an Entrepreneur or help others become successful. Share your successes and struggles and exchange business cards and brochures. Listen to experts in this field give their presentations and listen to their success stories!

Also, we are excited to have you become a member and share with our group.

Welcome Aboard!
results.name: 4-Women-Entrepreneurs

topics.name: Women Entrepreneurs
description:
Meet with other Online Futures and Forex Traders (face to face or online to your PC through our state of the art webinar tools) who engage in futures, bitcoin, crypto-currency, index's, commodities and forex trading.

The goals is to create a supportive environment where all group members can share their ideas, learn something new and ultimately achieve success in their trading plan.

Our group includes experienced local Floor Traders and Online Traders and newbie’s looking to start out on the right trading foot.

We will meet up with trading experts who will give educational presentations.

We also like to meet up and go out for a meal, some drinks and share stories - both good and bad.

Important Disclaimer:
Upon viewing, reading, utilizing, downloading, participation, attending, registration and/or purchase/attendance in/of any of the Online Traders Network, FBN, Floor Traders Club, Educational Products, Channels, Chat Rooms, Webinars, Videos, Newsletters or Services including put not limited to This Educational Only Channel, I hereby waive all claims against Online Traders Network, FBN, Floor Traders Club, spokespersons, linda lesniak, Saul Shaoul, sponsors, organizers, benefactors including the Financial Broadcasting Network or anyone else associated in any way with any of Online Traders Network, FBN, Floor traders Club Seminars, Educational Products, Workshops, Newsletters, Webinars, Events, Chat Rooms, Channels, DVDs or Trade-Along Online or other for any loss in trading or personal expense I incur related to but not limited to these materials/webinars/chat rooms/channels/seminars/newsletters and events.
I am aware and agree that these materials/webinars/chat rooms/channels/seminars/newsletters and events are provided/conducted for educational purposes only and Nothing provided is to be taken as trading advice.

IMPORTANT:
The risk of loss in online trading futures, options, cash currencies and other leveraged transaction products can be substantial. Therefore only “risk capital” should be used. Futures, options, cash currencies and other leveraged transaction products are not suitable investments for everyone. The valuation of futures, options, cash currencies and other leveraged transaction products may fluctuate and as a result clients may lose more than the amount originally invested and may also have to pay more later. Consider your financial condition before deciding to invest or online trade.

CFTC RULE 4.41
Hypothetical or simulated performance results have certain inherent limitations unlike actual performance record: simulated results do not represent actual trading. Also, since the trades have not actually been executed, the results may have under- or overcompensated of the impact, if any, of certain market factors, such as lack of liquidity. Simulated trading programs in general are also subject to the fact that they are designed with the benefit of hindsight. No presentation is being made that any account will or is likely to achieve profits or losses similar to those predicted or shown.
name: Futures, Forex and Bitcoin Trading Education Network

description:
Free option trading updates from WhiteRockUSA.com: https://forms.aweber.com/form/13/1422350713.htm

Free cryptocurrency trading updates and portfolio from Crypto Alpha www.Option80.com: http://forms.aweber.com/form/65/558119065.htm

Hello, and welcome to the Cryptocurrency and Option Trading Group.  We discuss Bitcoin, Altcoins, Butterflies, Condors, Ratios, Verticals, Positive Vega structures via crash protection, and more.  Most of our discussions lean toward trend following crypto coins, and positive theta option trading.  All experience levels are welcome.  The goal of this meetup is for all attendees to receive insightful information. 

The organizers run the WhiteRock Iron Condor and Iron Butterfly Newsletter which maintains a positive vega stance for crash protection.  WhiteRock has developed a unique way to structure 3 legged Spreads, and 5 legged Iron Condors and Butterflies, to collect premium, yet remain positive vega for crash protection.  When market crashes occur, the VIX quickly rises to elevated levels, and negative vega trade structures are adversely affected.  WhiteRock's trade structures have the potential to perform well in a market crash.

WhiteRock offers a complimentary newsletter with spread and performance updates: www.WhiteRockUSA.com

This meetup discusses, and discloses, these positive vega trade structures so attendees can implement them on their own.  Others may want to subscribe to our newsletter to follow along, or have a Registered Adviser implement the newsletter on their behalf. 

RISK STATEMENT: The trading of options, stocks, futures, commodities, index futures or any other securities has potential rewards, and it also has potential risks involved. Trading may not be suitable for all individuals. Anyone wishing to invest should seek his or her own independent financial or professional advice. Past performance is not necessarily indicative of future results. There are risks associated with all investments including trading stocks and options. No trading recommendations are being offered.  This information is for educational purposes only.  We, and any affiliates, are not offering financial advice, and by attending this event, or utilizing this information, you agree to our terms of use and service, and understand all risk is taken at your own discretion.

This group was formed to encourage collaboration among its members so that all members can become more profitable trading stocks, forex and now crypto currencies like Bitcoin by sharing information and ideas that will save each other time, money and energy in the process.

Let’s have fun, make money and enjoy the journey together in a friendly environment!

Please call me at (305) 389-0170 cell to introduce yourself and if you have any questions. You may also email me at: Mike@AutomaticProfits.com

Thank you and we look forward to meeting you and collaborating with you at our next meeting.

description:
Are you a Startup/Freelancer/Entrepreneur/Coder interested in cutting-edge blockchain technologies?

We have you covered! 


** In order to join this group, you must be approved. We want to make sure it grows organically... just like the blockchain!
name: BLOCKCHAIN CENTRAL

description: Blockchain Users Meetup -- share and learn: best practices, bitcoin ideas, brainstorming, troubleshooting, development, merchant services, investing, promotion, mobile application development, online sales automation, etc. We also cover other crypto-currencies and Crypto 2.0 ( Ethereum, Omni, Colored Coins, etc). This is a social, learning, and business networking group. Everyone is welcome. It should prove to be very profitable for all.  We also have a Facebook Group and a Website.
name: DC Blockchain Users Group (Bitcoin & Beyond)

description:
Digital Okanagan - Tech Community Events is a group for all technology community events happening in the Okanagan. The group has grown to include events such as Lean Coffee, HackNights, co-working and any other events that appeal to developers, designers and entrepreneurs. If there is a tech event you'd like to see in the Okanagan, please contact us!

Here are some popular ongoing events:

Startup Coffee Kelowna (#StartupCoffeeKL) #StartupCoffeeKL is a reboot on the long running #LeanCoffee movement which kicked off in Kelowna back in 2011. Startup Coffee has evolved into a social, morning coffee peer group which reviews and debates intertwined trends of startups, globalization, software, marketing, venture capital, technology, economics, regulations, etc. This series is intended to be useful for technical and business-minded folks alike, and engage the entire entrepreneurial stack.

Follow the Startup Coffee conversation on Twitter


#devKL is a biweekly meetup to encourage local software developers to collaborate and learn from each other. We're hoping to build the development community by providing group mentorship, and encouraging members to connect and continue the collaboration between events.

Art Brew Come hang with some funny, creative artists and share projects, inspiration or just bring your pencils and have a go at sketching. If anything else you’ll be caffeinated, stretch some drawing muscles and have a good laugh.

MAD Nights MAD (Marketing And Design) Nights are evenings of education and sharing stories (with some food, drink and networking on the side).

More about Mad Nights on Facebook


OKDG (Okanagan Developer Group) is a monthly meet-up hosting in a casual environment for technology and design professionals to socialize, network and share ideas. Our speakers cover topics ranging from typography to inversion of control and dependency injection. All people who are in the technology space are welcome. Our attendees' backgrounds vary from Software Engineering, Graphic Design, to Students and Project Managers.

More about OKDG at http://okdg.org

Other places to follow community activity with Digital Okanagan

    Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/digitalokanagan

    Twitter: http://twitter.com/digitalokanagan

    Web: http://digitalokanagan.ca
name: Digital Okanagan - Technology and Creative Community Events

name: The New York Online Bitcoin Trading Education Network

description:
Meeting since May 2011, the Silicon Valley Bitcoin Meetup group aims to deliver the most current trends, thought leaders and innovators helping to take Bitcoin mainstream.

Come network with developers, entrepreneurs and more while hearing from speakers representing every part of the Bitcoin ecosystem.

The number of Bitcoin users around the world is growing at a lightning pace. This Meetup Group is designed for Bitcoin users, merchants, monetary exchange dealers, developers, and consumers -- anyone who's interested in the success of the new totally anonymous digital currency called Bitcoin. Additionally, it acts as a mutual aid society, and a business networking group.

If you are interested in speaking, please fill out this form!

To learn more, visit Bitcoin.com
name: Silicon Valley Bitcoin

description:
SMC050 is een initiatief om professionals, bedrijven en experts op het gebied van technologische trends en digitale innovatie in de regio bij elkaar te brengen. 1x in de 6 weken een avond met twee lezingen @Martiniplaza.

Met onderwerpen als Augmented Reality, Chatbots, Blockchain, Internet Of Everything, Virtual Reality, Singularity, Exponential technologies, Drones, Virtual Assistants, Bitcoins, Privacy, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Cryptocurrencies, Conversational interfaces, Smart Cities, Smart farming, Startups, Wearables, Robotica en andere technologische trends.

=Tomorrow's Trends Today=

SMC050 is tevens een netwerk voor bedrijven, ondernemers en ondernemende mensen in de regio Groningen. Wij zijn echter geen business-netwerkborrel club.

Middels deze pagina meld je je aan voor de COMMUNITY van de SMC050. Je moet je dan zelf nog aanmelden voor het aankomende EVENEMENT van de SMC050 avond. Dat kan via de RSVP knop bij het evenement.

(NB: Mensen die zich wel aanmelden en zonder afmelding wegblijven zijn de volgende editie niet welkom, helaas.)

Heb je belangstelling voor bovengenoemde onderwerpen en is voor jou Groningen niet het einde van de wereld? Dan is een inschrijving voor deze groep zeker de moeite waard. Vragen? info@jarnoduursma.nl
name: SMC050
